name: Unlit Fields
description:
Pick the pumpkins as they grow, but beware what lurks beyond the light. 

Play alone or with a friend, collecting pumpkins and placing them in the wagon to achieve the highest score! If your lights go out, repair them quickly as you can. You are not alone in the fields.

Submission for the 2 week Halloween Game Jam 2020

This game supports keyboard and controller, however it was created for a DualShock 4 (PS4) controller and using any other controllers may have wonky key bindings.

Known Issues:

Sometimes it crashes, I wish it didn't. If you only have a single screen, I recommend not running the game in fullscreen as you will not be able to close it once it has crashed.

If you get an error about missing the msvcp140.dll or runtime140.dll files, please install them (instructions on Google).

If you get "loadlibrary failed with error 1114..." error go to windows settings -> battery power plans and turn the "switchable dynamic graphics" -> Global setting to Maxmise Performance
